sections.summary: bilingual network engineer offering in-depth understanding of it infrastructure areas, particularly it network design, implementation & optimization of wired & wireless network. detail-oriented self-starter with demonstrated success in initiating, tracking, reporting and closing projects.
sections.certifications: cct data center, ccnp, ccna, mcse, security +, network +, a+
